SEARCH
Package co.kr.bluebird.sled

Interface ISerialManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
Reader
public interface ISerialManager
Interface definition for serial manager(Only for Serial interface(Reader))

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    int
    SD_Connect()
    Connects to SLED(SLED DEV START)
    Operate it after receiving wake-up callback message(SLED_WAKEUP(47))

    Disconnects to SLED(SLED DEV STOP)

    SD_WakeupFaster()
    Wakes-up the SLED Caution : This API is only available for RFR900(USB-C type), RFR901.

  • Method Details

    • SD_Connect

      int SD_Connect()
      Connects to SLED(SLED DEV START)
      Operate it after receiving wake-up callback message(SLED_WAKEUP(47))
      Returns:
      Execution result value.(The detailed values are described in the implementation section.)

    • SD_Disconnect

      int SD_Disconnect()
      Disconnects to SLED(SLED DEV STOP)
      Returns:
      Execution result value.(The detailed values are described in the implementation section.)

    • SD_GetConnectState

      int SD_GetConnectState()
      Gets the connection state with the SLED
      Returns:
      Execution result value.(The detailed values are described in the implementation section.)

    • SD_Wakeup

      int SD_Wakeup()
      Wakes-up the SLED
      (In case of this API, Run time during about 800 millisecond is required. After the operation completed, it sends related callback message(SLED_WAKEUP(47)))
      Returns:
      Execution result value.(The detailed values are described in the implementation section.)

    • SD_WakeupFaster

      int SD_WakeupFaster()
      Wakes-up the SLED Caution : This API is only available for RFR900(USB-C type), RFR901.
      (In case of this API, Run time during about 100 millisecond is required. After the operation completed, it sends related callback message(SLED_WAKEUP(47)))
      Returns:
      Execution result value.(The detailed values are described in the implementation section.)
